item.title: Fox News sued by conservative outlet Newsmax over antitrust claims
item.description: Newsmax filed a lawsuit accusing conservative news giant Fox News of suppressing its right-leaning competitors.

item.title: Trump appeals ruling that National Guard deployment to LA broke the law
item.description: President Donald Trump has considered sending National Guard troops to Chicago and Boston, after deployments to Los Angeles and Washington, D.C.
